flyingWithUs.title: Seat-to-seat delivery
flyingWithUs.text: <p>Treat a travel companion or break the ice by sending a drink, meal, or snack to another seat with our Red™ touch screen entertainment system. Just browse our in-flight menus, select who’s having one on you, make your order, and we’ll deliver it directly to your guest of choice.</p>

flyingWithUs.title: Open tab
flyingWithUs.text: <p>Planning on having a few drinks or snacks or watching a few premium TV shows, and don’t want to swipe that card each time? <span style="line-height:1.6em">When you purchase your first item you can open a tab, order as </span><span style="line-height:1.6em">much as you want, and close it when you want.  No worries if you </span><span style="line-height:1.6em">forget; unlike most bartenders, we’ll close your tab for you at the </span><span style="line-height:1.6em">end of the flight.</span></p>

flyingWithUs.title: Entertainment with a touch
flyingWithUs.text: <p>Meet Red, our in-flight entertainment system. With just a few  light taps on your screen, you’re ready to enjoy newly released movies, live TV, music videos and songs from our music library. You can even play games.</p>

flyingWithUs.title: Internet
flyingWithUs.text:
<p>You’re living in the 21st century. Isn’t it time to fly like it?  Hop on a brand new Virgin America plane, discover that the future is now, and stay connected with our in–flight WiFi. It’ll make Al Gore proud.<br />
      </p>

flyingWithUs.title: Plugs
flyingWithUs.text: <p>Not only do we have WiFi on every flight to keep you connected, we also have standard and USB plugs at every seat. Keep your devices juiced up while you connect in the air.</p>

flyingWithUs.title: Buy things
flyingWithUs.text: <p>Red just got even better. Now you can shop over 200 covetable items through The Red Store, powered by SkyMall. Grab gadgets, jewelry, and more from top brands and we’ll ship them wherever you like.</p>

flyingWithUs.title: Chat
flyingWithUs.text: <p>Debrief with travel companions in other rows, mingle in a chat room, or wing it and strike up a chat with someone new. Go ahead; you know you want to.</p>

flyingWithUs.title: Google maps
flyingWithUs.text: <p>Kalamazoo? Tulsa? Where are we, and what was that giant mountain? Get answers with Google Terrain View maps, now equipped with fresher images and eight levels of zoom functionality.</p>

flyingWithUs.title: Make a difference
flyingWithUs.text: <p>Red lets you buy more than tantalizing food and drinks; it allows you to give back. Whether it’s carbon offsets or fighting cancer, a simple swipe gives you that good feeling deep down.</p>

items.title: Virgin Produced Channel
items.overview: <p>We\'ve teamed up with our friends at Virgin Produced to bring you an exclusive channel packed with fresh content available at 35,000 feet. Catch your favorite comedians in Mile High with Funny or Die, music videos on Vevo, original web series by Blip, and more. The Virgin Produced Channel is a one-stop shop for cutting-edge entertainment and a behind-the-scenes peek at Virgin Produced\'s latest films. Check out the lineup here, and tune into Channel 11 on your next flight.</p>

lineup.title: Studio Killers: Ode to the Bouncer
Mile High with Funny or Die

items.title: Flight Bites
items.text: Six of our freshest salads and snacks in one guilt-free sampler:  roasted beets with orange and feta; asparagus antipasto with marinated mozzarella and tomatoes; honey mushroom and fig salad; cheese bites; a smoked chicken with green lentil salad; and chocolate mousse with raspberry. Calories: 500; Fat: 33g; Carbohydrates: 34g; Protein: 18g (Contains dairy, poultry, and sugar.)

items.title: San Francisco Club Sandwich
items.text: Sliced sourdough bread piled high with turkey breast, smoked bacon, baby arugula, crisp lettuce, and Roma tomatoes. Served with a creamy feta cheese spread, and a Tcho chocolate on the side. Calories: 570; Fat: 18g; Carbohydrates: 67g; Protein: 32g (Contains wheat, dairy, and sugar.)

items.title: Mexican Cheese Plate **
items.text: A selection of Cotija, Chihuahua, and provolone cheese, served with red and green seedless grapes, dried peach and apple, with habanera crackers. (Contains dairy and wheat.)

items.title: Vegetable & Plantain Salad
items.text: Fresh lettuce tossed with ribbons of plantain, and zucchini, topped with panela cheese, black olives and a cherry tomato. Served with creamy tamarind dressing. (Contains dairy.)

items.title: Tomato & Mozzarella Sandwich
items.text: Freshly baked cornbread baguette with sun dried tomato and basil pesto spread, layered with baby spinach, green leaf lettuce, fresh mozzarella and Roma tomatoes, served with a Choco Mazapan candy on the side. (Contains dairy, wheat, and sugar)

items.title: Marinated Chicken Half Wrap
items.text: Lightly-marinated chicken breast with spinach leaves, tomato, plantains, green bell pepper, cheddar cheese, and refried beans rolled in a whole wheat tortilla wrap. Served with a refreshing cucumber and dill salad, and a Choco Mazapan candy for dessert. (Contains poultry, wheat, and dairy.)

items.title: Hearty Meal
items.text: This anytime combination includes Old Wisconsin beef salami, Late July Organic Crackers, Oakfield Farms cheddar cheese, Snyder’s mini pretzels, Welch’s fruit snacks, and Thin Addictives Cranberry Almond cookies.

items.title: Protein Meal
items.text: This protein-packed meal combines Bumble Bee lemon pepper tuna, multi-seed crackers, Wild Garden sundried tomato hummus, Partners crackers, Emerald\'s natural almonds and yummy fruit snacks.

items.title: Jet Set Kid Pack
items.text: This fun kids’ snack box comes with Giddy Dip’ems Snacks, Ritz Peanut Butter Crackers, Pepperidge Farm Whole Grain Goldfish, 18 Rabbits Bunny Bar, Dolphin Earbuds, and a slide puzzle to pass the time.
